N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-1.15 - School quota scholarships

State Regulations
(a) Where a minimum quota of scholarships is authorized for the students of a
specific school, under section
605
of the

Education Law, eligibility to receive such scholarships shall be limited to
students enrolled in such school on the date of the examination on which such
awards are based. (b) Where there
has been a merger, separation or other reorganization of high schools, such
that the number of graduates the preceding year would not provide a valid
criterion for the number of additional scholarships to be allocated within the
intent of the law, the commissioner may determine such appropriate reallocation
of such scholarships as he deems equitable. Notes
